sen.j: 馬野 正基（うまの まさき、本名：馬野正基1965年6月24日 -）は観世流の能楽師。
sen.e: Masaki UMANO (June 24, 1965 -) is a nohgakushi (noh actor) of the Kanze school.
Masaki UMANO (June 24, 1965 -) is a nohgakushi (noh actor) of the Kanze school.

sen.j: 観世流能シテ方馬野義男の長男(四人兄弟姉妹の二番目。妹に写真家馬野訓子(三女)がいる)
sen.e: He is the first son of Yoshio UMANO, who is Kanze-ryu noh shite-kata (a person who plays the main role in Kanze school noh plays) (second child of four siblings and his sister (third child) is the photographer Noriko UMANO).

sen.j: 中学、高校時代を宇治市で過ごす。

sen.j: 東京芸術大学邦楽科能楽専攻卒業
sen.e: He graduated from the Department of Traditional Japanese Music of the Faculty of Music, Tokyo National University of Fine Arts & Music, majoring in noh plays.

sen.j: 父及び河村隆司・観世銕之亟 (8世)・観世銕之丞 (9世)に師事。

sen.j: 3歳のとき『老松キリ』の仕舞で初舞台。
sen.e: He performed on stage for the first time in the play called "Oimatsu kiri (Cutting of a big old pine tree)" when he was three.

sen.j: 7歳で初シテ『猩猩能』、1995年『猩乱』、1996年『石橋 (能)』
sen.e: After he played the main role in "Shojono" when he was seven, he performed in "Shoran" in 1995 and "Shakkyo" (Stone Bridge, noh play) in 1996.

sen.j: 2007年、狂言大蔵流狂言方の山本泰太郎・則孝、藤田流笛方竹市学らと「三聲会」を結成し『望月』を披く。
sen.e: In 2007, he formed 'Sansei-kai Party' together with Yasutaro and Noritaka YAMAMOTO, who are Kyogen Okura-ryu kyogenkata (comic actors of the Okura school), and Manabu TAKEICHI, who is Fujita-ryu Fuekata (a person who plays the flute learned in the Fujita school), and played "Mochizuki" for the first time.

sen.j: 新作・復曲能や映画、海外公演にも多数参加。
